name: EU-Asia Centre
goal: To undertake research and organise events on EU-Asia relations
interests: External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trade
euInitiatives:
eu foreign policy towards Asia, monitoring/input on FTAs with Singapore, Vietnam, Thailand, Philippines; FTA and SPA with Japan; FTA with India; monitoring of FTA, SPA and CSDP agreements with ROK, monitoring of EU-China investment agreement.
We also input into the EEAS new global strategy.
